mapper.update: UPDATE publicity_message SET status = #{status}, examine_user_id = #{examinerId} WHERE id = #{id} AND status = 1
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.type, a.title, a.subtitle, a.summary, a.label, a.content, a.examine_user_id AS examineUserId, b.`name` AS examineUserName, a.create_user_id AS createUserId, c.`name` AS createUserName, a.`status`, a.publish_time AS publishTime, a.publish_target AS publishTarget FROM publicity_message a LEFT JOIN org_user b ON a.examine_user_id = b.id LEFT JOIN org_user c ON a.create_user_id = c.id WHERE a.id=#{id} AND a.is_delete = 0

SELECT a.id, a.type, a.title, a.subtitle, a.summary, a.label, a.content, a.examine_user_id AS examineUserId, b.`name` AS examineUserName, a.create_user_id AS createUserId, c.`name` AS createUserName, a.`status`, a.publish_time AS publishTime, a.publish_target AS publishTarget FROM publicity_message a LEFT JOIN org_user b ON a.examine_user_id = b.id LEFT JOIN org_user c ON a.create_user_id = c.id WHERE a.`status` = 9 AND a.is_delete = 0 AND a.type IN (1,2) ORDER BY publish_time ASC LIMIT 8;
